# AsyncStructuredAgent

## <ApiType type="Class" path="agents/async_structured_agent/AsyncStructuredAgent" symbolName="AsyncStructuredAgent" /> AsyncStructuredAgent

Asynchronous structured agent class for generating structured responses using LLMs with tools.
